alert.note: Alert for Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 1:42PM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected with locally stronger gusts south of the I-84/I- 86 junction near Idahome. * WHERE...Raft River Region including but not limited to Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers in the area could result in brief periods of blowing snow, reducing visibility on roadways. Use caution when driving.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
